title: Silver Core Stone · Competing for Materials

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第24集:银芯石·材料争夺。

scenes.description: 屋子一角有楼梯,附近摆着木椅,上面坐着一名面色焦黄、塌鼻子的老者,正微微瞌睡着。

visual.composition: Stairs in corner, wooden chair nearby, sallow-faced flat-nosed old man sitting, dozing slightly
visual.character_pose: Old man dozing in chair

scenes.prompt: Stairs in corner, wooden chair nearby, sallow-faced flat-nosed old man sitting, dozing slightly.
scenes.narration: 屋子一角有楼梯，附近摆着木椅，上面坐着一名面色焦黄的老者，正微微瞌睡。

scenes.description: 田兴毫不客气,几步上前抓住老者肩膀一阵猛摇,叫道:'胥老!别睡了,我给你带人来了。'

visual.composition: Tian Xing unceremoniously steps forward, grabs old man's shoulders, shakes him, shouts: 'Xu Lao! Wake up, I brought a customer!'
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing shaking old man, old man waking

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing unceremoniously steps forward, grabs old man's shoulders, shakes him, shouts: 'Xu Lao! Wake up, I brought a customer!'
scenes.narration: 田兴毫不客气，几步上前抓住老者肩膀一阵猛摇，叫道:'胥老!别睡了,我给你带人来了。'

scenes.description: 老者睁开朦胧双目,一副尚未睡醒的样子,问道:'客人。在哪儿?'

visual.composition: Old man opens bleary eyes, still half-asleep, asks: 'Customer. Where?'
visual.character_pose: Old man blinking, groggy

scenes.prompt: Old man opens bleary eyes, still half-asleep, asks: 'Customer. Where?'
scenes.narration: 老者睁开朦胧双目,一副尚未睡醒的样子,问道:'客人。在哪儿?'

scenes.description: 韩立打量完掌柜后,不动声色地问道:'听说贵店有些特殊的东西,在下过来看上一看。'

visual.composition: Han Li examines shopkeeper, asks calmly: 'I heard your shop has special items, came to take a look.'
visual.character_pose: Han Li asking, shopkeeper listening

scenes.prompt: Han Li examines shopkeeper, asks calmly: 'I heard your shop has special items, came to take a look.'
scenes.narration: 韩立打量完掌柜后，不动声色地问道:'听说贵店有些特殊的东西,在下过来看上一看。'

scenes.description: 掌柜目光在韩立身上一扫,停留片刻后露出笑容,称本店专门收购不同一般的东西出售给所需之人。

visual.composition: Shopkeeper scans Han Li, pauses, smiles, says shop specializes in acquiring unusual items for those who need them
visual.character_pose: Shopkeeper smiling, Han Li listening

scenes.prompt: Shopkeeper scans Han Li, pauses, smiles, says shop specializes in acquiring unusual items for those who need them.
scenes.narration: 掌柜目光在韩立身上一扫,停留片刻后露出笑容,称本店专门收购不同一般的东西出售给所需之人。

scenes.description: 韩立平静说道需要灵具材料,掌柜称需要这种材料的人不多,但本店还真有这么两件东西。

visual.composition: Han Li calmly says needs artifact materials, shopkeeper says few people need these, but shop does have two items
visual.character_pose: Both discussing, agreeing

scenes.prompt: Han Li calmly says needs artifact materials, shopkeeper says few people need these, but shop does have two items.
scenes.narration: 韩立平静说道需要灵具材料,掌柜称需要这种材料的人不多,但本店还真有这么两件东西。

scenes.description: 掌柜转身顺着楼梯蹬蹬上楼,韩立望着背影双目微眯,询问田兴此人是否也是炼体士。

visual.composition: Shopkeeper turns and climbs stairs, Han Li watches back with narrowed eyes, asks Tian Xing if shopkeeper is also body cultivator
visual.character_pose: Han Li observing, Tian Xing explaining

scenes.prompt: Shopkeeper turns and climbs stairs, Han Li watches back with narrowed eyes, asks Tian Xing if shopkeeper is also body cultivator.
scenes.narration: 掌柜转身顺着楼梯蹬蹬上楼,韩立望着背影双目微眯,询问田兴此人是否也是炼体士。

scenes.description: 田兴解释胥老以前是落日城颇有名气的高阶炼体士,数十年前在落日之墓中怪毒,失去力气。

visual.composition: Tian Xing explains Xu Lao was once famous high-level body cultivator in Sunset City, poisoned in Sunset Tomb decades ago, lost strength
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing explaining, Han Li listening

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing explains Xu Lao was once famous high-level body cultivator in Sunset City, poisoned in Sunset Tomb decades ago, lost strength.
scenes.narration: 田兴解释胥老以前是落日城颇有名气的高阶炼体士,数十年前在落日之墓中怪毒,失去力气。

scenes.description: 突然外面一声低低的兽吼,接着听到清冷的呵斥声:'畜生,找死!'随后传来砰砰两声闷响。

visual.composition: Suddenly low beast roar outside, cold voice: 'Beast, seeking death!' Followed by two thuds
visual.character_pose: Han Li and Tian Xing turning toward door

scenes.prompt: Suddenly low beast roar outside, cold voice: 'Beast, seeking death!' Followed by two thuds.
scenes.narration: 突然外面一声低低的兽吼,接着听到清冷的呵斥声:'畜生,找死!'随后传来砰砰两声闷响。

scenes.description: 韩立和田兴惊讶回身,只见从大门外走进来一男一女,门口两只怪兽背部朝地无法动弹。

visual.composition: Han Li and Tian Xing turn in surprise, see man and woman entering from door, two beasts on backs unable to move
visual.character_pose: Young man and woman entering, beasts downed

scenes.prompt: Han Li and Tian Xing turn in surprise, see man and woman entering from door, two beasts on backs unable to move.
scenes.narration: 韩立和田兴惊讶回身,只见从大门外走进来一男一女,门口两只怪兽背部朝地无法动弹。

scenes.description: 这对男女年纪都不大,男的英俊轩昂,女的容颜秀丽,二人身上灵压不低,应该是结丹期修士。

visual.composition: Young man and woman, man handsome and upright, woman beautiful, both have strong spirit pressure, should be Core Formation cultivators
visual.character_pose: Young cultivators standing, confident

scenes.prompt: Young man and woman, man handsome and upright, woman beautiful, both have strong spirit pressure, should be Core Formation cultivators.
scenes.narration: 这对男女年纪都不大,男的英俊轩昂,女的容颜秀丽,二人身上灵压不低,应该是结丹期修士。

scenes.description: 男子看见韩立和田兴,神念一扫发现田兴只是炼气期修士,当即喝问是否是店里伙计,话语里掩饰不住傲然。

visual.composition: Young man sees Han Li and Tian Xing, scans with spirit sense, finds Tian Xing only Qi Refining, arrogantly asks if they're shop assistants
visual.character_pose: Young man arrogant, Han Li calm

scenes.prompt: Young man sees Han Li and Tian Xing, scans with spirit sense, finds Tian Xing only Qi Refining, arrogantly asks if they're shop assistants.
scenes.narration: 男子看见韩立和田兴,神念一扫发现田兴只是炼气期修士,当即喝问是否是店里伙计,话语里掩饰不住傲然。

scenes.description: 田兴发现来人是两名结丹修士,心中一惊,连忙赔笑回道只是陪客人前来买东西的。

visual.composition: Tian Xing finds newcomers are Core Formation cultivators, startled, quickly smiles and explains he's just accompanying customer
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing nervous, smiling

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing finds newcomers are Core Formation cultivators, startled, quickly smiles and explains he's just accompanying customer.
scenes.narration: 田兴发现来人是两名结丹修士,心中一惊,连忙赔笑回道只是陪客人前来买东西的。

scenes.description: 楼梯声响起,胥老手中捧着一大一小两个锦盒,慢悠悠走下楼来。

visual.composition: Stairs creak, Xu Lao descends slowly holding one large and one small brocade box
visual.character_pose: Old man descending with boxes

scenes.prompt: Stairs creak, Xu Lao descends slowly holding one large and one small brocade box.
scenes.narration: 楼梯声响起,胥老手中捧着一大一小两个锦盒,慢悠悠走下楼来。

scenes.description: 胥老一见那对男女修士微微一怔,但目光往外一扫后,发现看门兽被伤,脸色微微一沉。

visual.composition: Xu Lao sees young cultivators, pauses, looks outside, finds guard beasts injured, face darkens slightly
visual.character_pose: Old man annoyed, young cultivators standing

scenes.prompt: Xu Lao sees young cultivators, pauses, looks outside, finds guard beasts injured, face darkens slightly.
scenes.narration: 胥老一见那对男女修士微微一怔,但目光往外一扫后,发现看门兽被伤,脸色微微一沉。

scenes.description: 青年皮笑肉不笑地说道只是略加教训,并未真伤到性命,吕师妹是黄粱前辈的后人。

visual.composition: Young man says with fake smile only gave slight lesson, didn't really hurt, Miss Lü is Huangliang Spirit Lord's descendant
visual.character_pose: Young man arrogant, old man listening

scenes.prompt: Young man says with fake smile only gave slight lesson, didn't really hurt, Miss Lü is Huangliang Spirit Lord's descendant.
scenes.narration: 青年皮笑肉不笑地说道只是略加教训,并未真伤到性命,吕师妹是黄粱前辈的后人。

scenes.description: 胥老听到黄粱灵君的后人,脸色微变但马上恢复如常,几步走到韩立面前,将手中锦盒递过去。

visual.composition: Xu Lao hears Huangliang Spirit Lord's descendant, face changes but recovers, steps to Han Li, offers boxes
visual.character_pose: Old man giving boxes, Han Li receiving

scenes.prompt: Xu Lao hears Huangliang Spirit Lord's descendant, face changes but recovers, steps to Han Li, offers boxes.
scenes.narration: 胥老听到黄粱灵君的后人,脸色微变但马上恢复如常,几步走到韩立面前,将手中锦盒递过去。

scenes.description: 韩立目光一闪,先问道:'盒中的是何稀奇之物,胥掌柜不先介绍一二吗?'

visual.composition: Han Li's eyes flash, asks first: 'What rare items are in boxes, Shopkeeper Xu won't introduce them?'
visual.character_pose: Han Li asking, shopkeeper holding boxes

scenes.prompt: Han Li's eyes flash, asks first: 'What rare items are in boxes, Shopkeeper Xu won't introduce them?'
scenes.narration: 韩立目光一闪,先问道:'盒中的是何稀奇之物,胥掌柜不先介绍一二吗?'

scenes.description: 胥老淡淡说道一个是叫银芯石的材料,一个本人也不知道是何物,顺手打开一个锦盒,露出淡银色石头。

visual.composition: Xu Lao says calmly one is Silver Core Stone material, other he doesn't know, opens box revealing pale silver stone
visual.character_pose: Shopkeeper opening box, stone visible

scenes.prompt: Xu Lao says calmly one is Silver Core Stone material, other he doesn't know, opens box revealing pale silver stone.
scenes.narration: 胥老淡淡说道一个是叫银芯石的材料,一个本人也不知道是何物,顺手打开一个锦盒,露出淡银色石头。

scenes.description: 胥老将盖子一合,手一扬,直接将两个锦盒射向韩立,站在一旁的秀丽女子一听银芯石的名字,突然变得惊喜交加。

visual.composition: Xu Lao closes lid, throws both boxes to Han Li, beautiful woman hears Silver Core Stone name, suddenly overjoyed
visual.character_pose: Boxes flying, woman excited

scenes.prompt: Xu Lao closes lid, throws both boxes to Han Li, beautiful woman hears Silver Core Stone name, suddenly overjoyed.
scenes.narration: 胥老将盖子一合,手一扬,直接将两个锦盒射向韩立,站在一旁的秀丽女子一听银芯石的名字,突然变得惊喜交加。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第25集即将开始。
